ethics_bias_page.title: Ethics, Privacy & User Consent
ethics_bias_page.body: This section outlines the ethical considerations and privacy practices for the Cognitive Dating App, ensuring responsible handling of cognitive and personal data.
data_limits: Does not make guarantees about compatibility or match success.
Does not share personal information with third parties.
Data is used only for generating match suggestions and is not sold.
bias_disclosure: Matches are based on simplified cognitive style logic and may not reflect the full complexity of human behavior.
Some cognitive styles may be underrepresented in the mock logic.
ethics_bias_page.opt_in_language: By using this app, you agree to allow Cognitive Dating to process your cognitive style and profile information for match suggestions. Participation is voluntary and data is handled responsibly.
